summary: Replaces the Ragnar the Red song with the trololo song (ONLY FOR MIKHAEL IN THE BANNERED MARE, WHITERUN)
descriptionHtml:
v2.0 Changelog
----------------------------
- Subtitles changed to that of Trololo's as opposed to Ragnar the Red's
- Some dialogue changed
- Mikael renamed to Mr. Khil
- Mikael's model changed

You may have noticed this has slight pauses in the song. This is because Ragnar the Red was in 6 parts, so I split Trololo into 6.

[youtube]A9lRVEjusHE[/youtube]
(Version 1.0)

If someone could change Mikhael's model to one that looked a bit more like the Trololo guy, I would really appreciate it. Also, if someone could do a good deep russian accented voice, I would like to change all Mikael's audio files

If you can do one or more of the above things just comment and we will sort sommat out
author: Tyf-E
